entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening then changing to snow this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon. Snow level rising to 1400 metres in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Snow level lowering to 1000 metres in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
